user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfortable, stylish, and well-fitting clothing that accommodates my changing body size while maintaining versatility for different occasions.
purchase_reason: I was looking for comfortable and stylish pants that could transition from casual to semi-formal settings. The hidden expandable waistband and the fabric's comfort were key features that appealed to me, as I value quality and durability in my clothing. The positive experience from previous years of wearing similar pants also influenced my decision.

After losing weight, I needed a new pair of jeans that fit better than my previous relaxed fit. The recommendation from the salesman to try a classic fit was crucial, as it provided a better fit and comfort. The fit over boots and the deep pockets were also important features that met my needs.

I have a long-standing preference for this brand, but my recent weight loss meant that my usual size was now too small. I was drawn to the sturdy appearance and comfort features of the jeans, but I realized I needed to try them on in-store to ensure the right fit, which indicates a need for a more hands-on approach to my decision.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that are easy to use and set up, as indicated by my positive experiences with watches that have intuitive features like alarms and night-lights. I value quality and comfort in clothing, particularly in shirts and pants that maintain their shape, do not fade, and are versatile for both casual and work settings. Additionally, I appreciate durable materials and thoughtful design, such as pockets and relaxed fits, which enhance functionality. On the other hand, I tend to dislike items that do not fit well, particularly if they are too large or have an awkward length, as well as products that compromise on quality, such as those with fragile components. Overall, I seek reliable, comfortable, and well-constructed items that meet my practical needs.
